main_pass.tooltip: FFV1 version. Level 3 is recommended for best compression and features.
Entropy coder. 0=Golomb-Rice, 1=Range coder, 2=Range coder with custom state transition table.
Context model. 1 enables larger context for better compression.
GOP (Group of Pictures) size. 1 means every frame is a keyframe (best for editing).
Number of slices per frame. More slices = better multithreading but slightly worse compression.
Add CRC checksum to each slice for error detection.
Pixel format. rgba64le preserves full quality with alpha. yuv formats are smaller but lossy for RGB sources.

save_metadata.tooltip: Embed workflow metadata (prompt, workflow JSON) into the video file.

trim_to_audio.tooltip: Trim the video to match the audio duration instead of padding audio to match video.
